meanings.definition: Of or relating to an amoeba.
meanings.sent1: The amebean organism moved slowly under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the amebean characteristics of the single-celled organism.
meanings.sent3: The amebean creature wiggled in a funny way, resembling a tiny blob.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were as fluid and amebean as a microscopic organism.
meanings.sent5: The amebean shape of the cell was fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: Resembling an amoeba in shape or movement.
meanings.sent1: The jellyfish had an amebean appearance as it floated gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a painting with amebean forms that seemed to flow together.
meanings.sent3: The amebean cloud slowly changed shape, like a giant amoeba in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts drifted in an amebean manner, constantly shifting and changing.
meanings.sent5: The amebean motion of the lava lamp was mesmerizing to watch.
